paragraphs.body: Whitfield guest-starred in several episodes of Friends as Dr. Barry Farber, Rachel's orthodontist ex-fiancé whom Rachel left at the altar on their wedding day. He has also appeared in Dharma & Greg; Murder, She Wrote; Diagnosis Murder; CSI: Crime Scene Investigation; and Curb Your Enthusiasm. In the 1992 film My Cousin Vinny, Whitfield starred as Stan Rothenstein, opposite Ralph Macchio. He also appeared in an episode of The Suite Life of Zack & Cody.
paragraphs.text: Whitfield guest-starred in several episodes of Friends as Dr. Barry Farber, Rachel's orthodontist ex-fiancé whom Rachel left at the altar on their wedding day. He has also appeared in Dharma & Greg; Murder, She Wrote; Diagnosis Murder; CSI: Crime Scene Investigation; and Curb Your Enthusiasm. In the 1992 film My Cousin Vinny, Whitfield starred as Stan Rothenstein, opposite Ralph Macchio. He also appeared in an episode of The Suite Life of Zack & Cody.

paragraphs.body: As a voice actor, Whitfield voiced Phobos on W.I.T.C.H. and Donatello in the first Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles film.
paragraphs.text: As a voice actor, Whitfield voiced Phobos on W.I.T.C.H. and Donatello in the first Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles film.
